alert.note: Alert for Monroe (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Pulaski, Giles, southwestern Craig, west central Floyd, east central Bland, eastern Wythe, northwestern Carroll, western Montgomery and Monroe Counties and the City of Radford through 830 PM EDT... At 745 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Red Sulphur Spring to near White Gate to near Ivanhoe. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Blacksburg... Christiansburg... Radford... Pulaski... Pearisburg... Dublin... and Narrows. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
